attributes.action: Please Remove The Salford Internet Ban On Social Networking Sites, such as Facebook, My Space, Bebo Etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this "no-more-ban" petition is for the removal of the salford city content blocker on the social networking sites such as facebook, bebo, my space etc. its a neccisty in life most ppeople cant live without it, everone please sign, from shorty

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
